text: "Arnold Layne" is first single from Pink Floyd in 1967. It is on the American release of their first studio album, The Piper at the Gates of Dawn. Later it was also on compilation albums Relics and Echoes: The Best of Pink Floyd. ==Song list== All songs were written by Syd Barrett. But, Interstellar Overdrive was written by Syd Barrett, Roger Waters, Rick Wright and Nick Mason. ===1967 single=== ===1967 French EP=== ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Pink Floyd songs Category:LGBT songs Category:Psychedelic pop songs
title: Arnold Layne
